home.title: RPG Random Tables Generator
home.subtitle: Create, organize and share random tables for your RPG games. Design your own pages with tables in bento box layout.

tables.title: Random Tables
tables.description: Create tables with custom weights and probabilities. Perfect for random encounters, treasures, events and more.

pages.title: Table Pages
pages.description: Organize your tables on personalized pages. Use bento box layout for better readability and access.
